Detailed Description

This file contains implementation of engine part of MIN event system.

Version:
0.1

LOCAL int event_comp ( const void *  list_data,
const void *  user_data 
)

List comparison function for events. Passed as an arg to dl_list_find(). The event is searched by event name.

Parameters:
list_data list item data to be compared
user_data the data searched.
Returns:
a matching event if found, INITPTR if not found
